name: Only One Meal - Cooking Crafting Puzzle
name_original: Only One Meal - Cooking Crafting Puzzle
description:
Combine three ingredients at a time to make either new ingredients or dish, until you've made one three-course meal! This is an updated version of a game made for the GMTK 2019, with new art. I hope to continue this little project and develop it into a full little game ^__^ .

HINTS for you! 
1. Check the console!
2. This meal includes an Italian Classic, a side of Bread, and a Salad topped with Balsamic Vinaigrette. 
3. Cancel an item choice by clicking it in the mix panel. 

Ingredients art by Theresa D. Thank you!
